name: Run Gun Die Ultimate Demo
detailed_description:
Run Gun Die Ultimate is a top-down shooter with procedurally generated levels for our heroine to explore and fight though. The sole purpose of each level is to find your partner waiting for you at the end of the level. The gameplay is inspired by the dual joystick games of old.

Explore for treasure, break crates and barrels, open chests and tombs, but don't stay still long as enemies will find you. Fight skeletons, shamans, run from chargers and face mini bosses (slayer, lava and acid) all while finding your way out.

Take the gold you earn from collecting treasure to buy new weapons or upgrade your existing ones. Please note there are no real money options or microtransactions in this game.

We highly recommend a joystick with dual analog support.

Run Gun Die Ultimate is designed to be tough, but not impossible in a casual adventure setting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: i3-3220 Intel or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 750 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Run Gun Die is a shooter that includes levels comprised of cartoon violence.  

All characters and enemies can be set on fire, explode in cartoon bones, ragdoll or show only lower torso at death. 

Enemies will attack with varying weapons from swords, guns, magic spells, fire, ice, lava and acid. There are also traps set that will spring spears, saws, lava and acid. 

Other than the "death" where the lower torso is left there is no visual representation of impalement, gun shot wounds or burns.

There is no nudity and there are no depictions of sex, drug or alcohol use.
